about.title: About Us - Vibe | Sushi & Cocktail Bar Cluj
about.description: Learn the story of Vibe Fusion Cluj - the restaurant that blends Japanese tradition with modern innovation. A unique culinary experience in the heart of Cluj since 2024.
about.keywords: about Vibe Cluj, sushi restaurant, brand story, fusion cuisine, Japanese chef, culinary experience
about.ogTitle: The Vibe Story - Japanese Fusion in Cluj
about.ogDescription: Discover the story of Vibe Fusion, the restaurant bringing Japanese tradition and modern innovation to the heart of Cluj.
about.twitterDescription: Learn about Vibe Fusion Cluj - where Japanese tradition meets modern innovation in a unique culinary experience.

contact.twitterDescription: Contact Vibe Cluj for reservations and information. Open daily 10:00-24:00 in central Cluj.

reservations.title: Reservations - Vibe | Sushi & Cocktail Bar Cluj
reservations.description: Reserve your table at Vibe Cluj and guarantee your perfect culinary experience. Simple and fast online reservations for premium sushi and cocktails.
reservations.keywords: Vibe Cluj reservations, online table booking, restaurant booking, sushi reservations, cocktail table
reservations.ogDescription: Reserve your table at Vibe and enjoy fresh sushi and premium cocktails. Simple and fast online booking.
reservations.twitterDescription: Book your table at Vibe Cluj online. Fresh sushi, premium cocktails, and vibrant atmosphere await you.

hero.subtitle: Delicious food with vibes
hero.description: Step into an experience where every hour has its own flavor. Come in for specialty coffee and stay for the sushi; experience the buzz of daytime brunch and the magic of nighttime bites. It's all about the vibe!

welcome.title: Welcome to the Vibe!
welcome.intro: By morning, sunlight pours in as you sip on boutique coffees and savor brunch classics with a twist. By evening, the neon Vibe sign glows and the space comes alive with colorful sushi rolls and crafted cocktails.
welcome.description: The atmosphere is upbeat and youthful, yet relaxed. Lush greenery and tropical touches give the feeling of an urban oasis. It's the kind of place where students, professionals, and travelers alike gather with friends to enjoy good coffee, good food, and good vibes.

tryMenu.title: Fusion Cuisine Experience
tryMenu.intro: The menu is as eclectic as the crowd, featuring everything from fluffy Eggs Benedict to elegant nigiri. Each dish and drink is an adventure in fusion: East meets West, classic meets modern.
tryMenu.description: From specialty third-wave coffee and homemade croissants to midday ramen and poke bowls, ending with sushi rolls and cocktails - all in the same venue. This playful creativity runs through our entire menu.

discoverVenue.title: A Tropical Corner in Cluj
discoverVenue.intro: Vibe Fusion is often described as 'a tropical corner in the city' - thanks to its lush, vibrant atmosphere and warm decor.
discoverVenue.description1: Our terraces offer the perfect escape from city bustle, where tropical nature meets modern design. Savor special moments in our relaxing atmosphere, with delicious food and refreshing drinks.
discoverVenue.description2: Whether you're a coffee aficionado, sushi enthusiast, or just looking for a friendly place to hang out, Vibe Fusion wants you to feel like part of the family.

about.title: Our Brand Story
about.description1: Vibe Fusion began with a bold idea: combine three essential elements of an unforgettable culinary experience in one place. High-quality sushi, amazing drinks, and creative fusion cuisine coexist where tradition meets innovation.
about.description2: From opening day in May 2024, we positioned ourselves as more than a restaurant - it's a lifestyle hub for Cluj's young and young-at-heart. Our chefs treat their craft as art, with dedication to quality showing in every dish.
about.description3: What sets us apart is this fusion of food, atmosphere, and community. We constantly refresh the menu with seasonal ingredients and multicultural inspirations, ensuring there's always something new to discover.

contact.brasovDescription: Our second location in beautiful Brașov

footer.description: Experience exceptional dining in the heart of Cluj-Napoca, where culinary mastery meets warm hospitality.

aboutPage.title: About Vibe Fusion Cluj
aboutPage.subtitle: A one-of-a-kind restaurant concept that blends day and night, coffee and cocktails, East and West – all under one roof.
aboutPage.storyDescription1: Vibe Fusion began with a bold idea: combine three essential elements of an unforgettable culinary experience in one place. High-quality sushi, amazing drinks, and creative fusion cuisine coexist where tradition meets innovation.
aboutPage.storyDescription2: From opening day in May 2024, we positioned ourselves as more than a restaurant - it's a lifestyle hub for Cluj's young and young-at-heart. Our chefs treat their craft as art, with dedication to quality showing in every dish.
aboutPage.storyDescription3: What sets us apart is this fusion of food, atmosphere, and community. We constantly refresh the menu with seasonal ingredients and multicultural inspirations, ensuring there's always something new to discover.
aboutPage.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide everything we do at Vibe Fusion Cluj.
aboutPage.communityDescription: We create a welcoming space where students, professionals, and travelers gather to enjoy good vibes. Everyone is invited to be part of our story.
aboutPage.fusionDescription: Our menu bridges worlds - breakfast and dinner, Romania and Asia, casual and fine - into something entirely new and exciting.
aboutPage.qualityDescription: From latte art hearts in your coffee to carefully chosen marinated tuna, every dish is crafted with care and attention to detail.
aboutPage.productsSubtitle: From specialty third-wave coffee and homemade croissants to midday ramen and poke bowls, ending with sushi rolls and cocktails - all in the same venue.
aboutPage.coffeeDescription: Third-wave coffee culture with boutique beans and artisan preparation techniques.
aboutPage.brunchDescription: From fluffy Eggs Benedict to creative fusion dishes with a modern twist.
aboutPage.sushiDescription: Fresh sushi, poke bowls, and Asian-inspired dishes crafted with premium ingredients.
aboutPage.cocktailsDescription: Creative cocktails and specialty drinks that surprise and delight our guests.

contactPage.heroSubtitle: Visit us at our locations or send us a message
contactPage.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your inquiry, reservation request, or feedback...

reservationsPage.title: Reserve Your Table
reservationsPage.subtitle: Book your table at Vibe Fusion and experience our unique fusion of flavors, atmosphere, and hospitality.
reservationsPage.bookingDescription: Click below to make your reservation through our booking partner ialoc.ro
reservationsPage.advanceBookingDescription: We recommend booking in advance, especially for weekends and special occasions.
reservationsPage.groupBookingsDescription: For groups of 8+ people, please contact us directly for special arrangements.
reservationsPage.specialEventsDescription: Private dining and event hosting available. Contact us for custom packages.
reservationsPage.contactDescription: Our team is here to assist you with any special requests or questions about your booking.
